page.title: 08HOME LIFE
page.content: Gas, electricity, oil, coal and solar panels provide domestic heating and power for household and cooking appliances. Almost every house has a TV set, with 37% having 2 or more. 78% have a deep freeze; 60% a telephone; 20% a video recorder, microwave oven and/or computer. 50% have 1 car, 22% 2 and 9% 3 or more; 10% 1 or more motor- cycles; 70% 1 or more bicycles. All homes have hot water, bath and inside toilet. Daily baths or showers are usual. Washing machines for clothes and in some cases for dishes ease the daily chores. There is also a public launderette. Electric drills and other do-it-yourself tools reduce the need for costly minor repairs etc and encourage home improvements. A basic 40-hour working week and 2 week annual holidays at home or abroad allow time for leisure and recreation at home
